channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16625] Performance test for interface unified with AP
item.description: Due to one more thread context changed in AP, the performance should be tested. Let me do it in this issue.
item.summary: Performance test for interface unified with AP

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

comments.comment:
Test for Increment w/ or w/o patch in HBASE-16610, in standalone mode, do three tests with PE 


 bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.PerformanceEvaluation --rows=10000 --nomapred increment 10

without the patch, results:


2016-09-14 00:39:29,190 INFO  [main] hbase.PerformanceEvaluation: [IncrementTest] Summary of timings (ms): [25339, 25285, 25288, 25344, 25331, 25272, 25304, 25340, 25323, 25294]

2016-09-14 00:39:29,191 INFO  [main] hbase.PerformanceEvaluation: [IncrementTest]       Min: 25272ms    Max: 25344ms    Avg: 25312ms



2016-09-14 00:46:06,282 INFO  [main] hbase.PerformanceEvaluation: [IncrementTest] Summary of timings (ms): [27515, 27547, 27386, 27547, 27542, 27362, 27529, 27377, 27527, 27537]

2016-09-14 00:46:06,283 INFO  [main] hbase.PerformanceEvaluation: [IncrementTest]       Min: 27362ms    Max: 27547ms    Avg: 27486ms



2016-09-14 00:49:05,878 INFO  [main] hbase.PerformanceEvaluation: [IncrementTest] Summary of timings (ms): [28079, 28076, 28055, 27834, 28096, 28090, 27758, 28078, 28046, 28094]

2016-09-14 00:49:05,878 INFO  [main] hbase.PerformanceEvaluation: [IncrementTest]       Min: 27758ms    Max: 28096ms    Avg: 28020ms

with the pach:


2016-09-14 00:56:05,546 INFO  [main] hbase.PerformanceEvaluation: [IncrementTest] Summary of timings (ms): [26391, 26562, 26553, 26617, 26434, 26616, 26486, 26622, 26337, 26529]

2016-09-14 00:56:05,547 INFO  [main] hbase.PerformanceEvaluation: [IncrementTest]       Min: 26337ms    Max: 26622ms    Avg: 26514ms



2016-09-14 00:57:00,886 INFO  [main] hbase.PerformanceEvaluation: [IncrementTest] Summary of timings (ms): [25914, 25981, 25996, 25899, 26026, 26067, 26060, 25944, 26033, 25921]

2016-09-14 00:57:00,887 INFO  [main] hbase.PerformanceEvaluation: [IncrementTest]       Min: 25899ms    Max: 26067ms    Avg: 25984ms



2016-09-14 00:57:46,107 INFO  [main] hbase.PerformanceEvaluation: [IncrementTest] Summary of timings (ms): [26405, 26258, 26299, 26420, 26355, 26159, 26123, 26387, 26409, 26370]

2016-09-14 00:57:46,107 INFO  [main] hbase.PerformanceEvaluation: [IncrementTest]       Min: 26123ms    Max: 26420ms    Avg: 26318ms

It seems there is no big difference w/ or w/o patch in HBASE-16610

Append Test, 10 runs for command


 bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.PerformanceEvaluation --rows=10000 --nomapred append 10

With the patch, avg: 20123ms


2016-09-15 19:27:14,311 INFO  [main] hbase.PerformanceEvaluation: [AppendTest] Summary of timings (ms): [26022, 26001, 25897, 25750, 25962, 25863, 25207, 25871, 26052, 26069]

2016-09-15 19:43:57,376 INFO  [main] hbase.PerformanceEvaluation: [AppendTest]  Min: 16525ms    Max: 16856ms    Avg: 16703ms

After unified ap with append, it seems there is 14% performance downgrade.

Retest increment, 10 runs for command:


bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.PerformanceEvaluation --rows=10000 --nomapred increment 10

without patch, avg: 28006ms

upload the original test log, each log has 10 runs of pe
